name: Space Samurai
description:
This was the first platform game that I made in GameMaker, thusly the mechanics can be a bit janky at times. It was intended to be a cooperative monster hunting game set input a cyberpunk far future. It hit a roadblock when I realized how difficult animating giant monsters and robots would be, as I create all of my art assets myself. After realizing that the scope was too ambitious, I relegated this prototype to a study on platform movement options and physics. This project is on indefinite hiatus.

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Left Click: Shoot

Right Click: Grapple hook

Space: Jump

Shift: Run

E: Interact

Q: Heal
